title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Networking proves a valuable investment now. You have a lot to offer the world around you; but you can give even more if youre also willing to receive without the fear that ensuing obligations could restrict your freedom. Although you might prefer to accomplish everything on your own, only so much is possible before you need help to undertake larger endeavors. In spite of your self-sufficiency, involving others enables you to reap even sweeter rewards. An Ethiopian proverb states, When spider webs unite, they can tie up a lion. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
